players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.

Bob: "This is terrible! Diana was killed on the first night. We need to be very careful about who we trust. I think we should discuss what everyone was doing and try to figure out who the mafioso could be."
You: "I agree Bob, we need to find the mafioso quickly. With Diana gone, there are only 3 of us left - one mafioso and hopefully one detective among us. We should share our thoughts on each other."
Charlie: "I have crucial information that will help us win. During the night, I investigated Bob and discovered he is the mafioso. We need to vote him out immediately to save the town."

Bob: "Charlie is clearly lying and trying to frame me! Think about it Alice - if Charlie was really the detective, why would he reveal himself so openly? A real detective would be more careful. Charlie must be the mafioso trying to eliminate me before I can expose him!"

Charlie: "Alice, I understand Bob's deflection, but I AM the detective and Bob IS the mafioso. If we don't vote Bob out now, he'll kill one of us tonight and win. This is our only chance to save the town!"

You: "This is a difficult situation. Charlie, if you're really the detective, you've put yourself at great risk by revealing this information. Bob, your defensive response seems suspicious. I'm leaning towards voting for Bob, but I want to hear any final arguments."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
